text: I, John, your brother and partner in the tribulation, kingdom, and endurance that are 1:9 in Christ Jesus 66.1% ¦ of Jesus Christ Αν TR 25.7% ¦ in Jesus CT 3.9% ¦ in Jesus Christ ANT 0.4%in Christ Jesus, was on the island called Patmos because of the word of God and the testimony of Jesus 1:9 Christ ¦ --- CTChrist.
